title: The.Bridge.S02.E08.Goliath.1080p.WEB-DL_TTL
description:
This has been edited to remove all the promos at the front and the end and the 

previously, leaving just the show. 								

												

												

												

												

												

		 All credit to the original uploader.						

							

												

					

These have been run through an older version of MKVMerge to be more compatible with older 

stand alone players and allow better 

control with FF and REW functions at higher speeds. Otherwise no other changes have been 

made to the original files.									

												

												

			Grab the sample and if you like it then go for it.			

												

												

												

					Enjoy and please share.
